representation_information.name: Truevision TGA File format, version 1.0
representation_information.description: A simple raster format for individual images first established by Truevision, Inc. in 1984. Designed for use on systems that use MS-DOS color applications, TGA is the native format of Truevision's TARGA boards, which were some of the first graphic cards for IBM-compatible PCs to support truecolor display (most often defined as 24-bit RGB color encoding).

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
